subject: Order Ssn4229 - request for reimbursement
description_text:
Bonjour,

Je me permet de vous envoyer a nouveau un message pour mes éléments
manquant dans ma commande ssn4229,
Pour résumé : un oublie a ete faut dans ma commande (baseplate) avec 2
pedale et hapitque,

Je cherche a avoir des nouvelles mais jamais de réponse,

REMBOURSER MOI tout simplement que je garde une bonne image de votre marque

On ne me donne aucun delai, aucun retour, l’envoi du colis ne fonctionne
pas depuis le 17decembre, cest inadmissible

La baseplate en noir et sur Amazon, en 10 jours,

Arrêter de me faire tourner en rond et rembourser moi !!!
J’en ai assez d’attendre vos reponses qui n’apporte aucun avancement

conversations.body_text: Hi karim hassaine,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused and will resend your order as soon as possible. Additionally, shipments from China have been particularly slow recently. If needed, we can ship the silver base plate (black is currently out of stock) from our German warehouse.

Hello,
Thank you for your reply. I must admit I'm disappointed (it was a
Christmas gift).
Is it possible to refund the value of the plate and footrest (listed
on your website as €69.95)? (I can find one myself on Amazon in a
week.)
I don't like the silver plate.
I look forward to your reply.

Baseplate – SIMSONN
<https://www.simsonn.com/products/baseplate?variant=50673233658170>


Le ven. 12 déc. 2025 à 13:22, service@simsonn.com

Bonsoir, étant donné votre temps de réponse et pour être le plus efficace
possible dans mes interrogations, pouvez-vous m'indiquer en combien de
temps vous pourrez m'envoyer le repose pied en couleur noir?
Et si le temps dépassé les 10 jours, pouvez-vous me rembourser sans
négociation?
Votre article est disponible sous 10 jours au même prix que sur votre site
sur Amazon, C’est un cadeau de Noël, donc comprenez le caractère d’urgence.
Merci



Le ven. 12 déc. 2025 à 13:22, service@simsonn.com
ID 号为 7989 和 8303 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单7989  
      主题: ORDER #SSN4229 - Hassaine Karim  
      描述:   Hello, how are you?

I'm contacting you regarding my order   .
The footrest base is missing from the package, even though it was ordered.
Please provide a solution as soon as possible.
Sincerely,

合并来自工单8303  
      主题: Order SSN4229 - Urgent - black baseplate missing from package  
      描述:  Good evening, given your response time and to answer my questions as efficiently as possible, could you please tell me how soon you can send me the footrest in black?  And if it takes longer than 10 days, can you refund me without negotiation? Your item is available within 10 days at the same price as on your Amazon website. It's a Christmas gift, so please understand the urgency. Thank you.
Hi karim hassaine,    We apologise for any inconvenience caused and will arrange for a replacement to be sent to you as soon as possible.

c'est une blague ?
vous ne traitee pas vos clients de la bonne maniere !
quel est le delai d'envoi !?
1 mois, 3 mois, 6 mois ?


Le mer. 17 déc. 2025 à 04:07, service@simsonn.com
Hi karim hassaine,    We apologize for the delay. Your order will be shipped today, with an estimated delivery time of 6-12 days.

As proof, I would like the package tracking number, please.

This is indeed the flat black base, right? Please confirm.


Le mer. 17 déc. 2025 à 08:27, service@simsonn.com
Hi karim hassaine,    This is your logistics tracking link.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047181661954

Bonjour, je me permets de vous contacter car hier le lien que l'on m'a
donné, ne bouge absolument pas

Est-ce que c'est un moyen pour vous de me faire patienter ?

Je suis très déçu de vos services, j’attendais plus de professionnalisme

Le mer. 17 déc. 2025 à 08:52, service@simsonn.com

Good evening, given your response time and to answer my questions as
efficiently as possible, could you please tell me how soon you can send me
the footrest in black?

And if it takes longer than 10 days, can you refund me without negotiation?

Your item is available within 10 days at the same price as on your Amazon
website. It's a Christmas gift, so please understand the urgency. Thank you

Bonjour,
Pouvez vous me dire quand ma commande va partir svp ? RIen ne bouge et on
m'a dit entre 6-12 jours
[image: image.png]

Le mer. 17 déc. 2025 à 08:52, service@simsonn.com

Hi karim hassaine,     Your order from SIMSONN was sent out in 2 packages. The tracking number for the Plus X Pedals is SF6047110522748, the shipping carrier is SF Express, you can track it via https://www.sf-international.com/cn/en/support/querySupport/waybill. And the tracking number for the motors is YT2533500714400158, the shipping carrier is YunExpress, you can track it via https://www.yunexpress.com/.

Non, je fais suite à l’oubli qu’il y avait dans mon colis,
On devait me le faire parvenir par la suite

Il manquait la platine repose pied

Hi karim hassaine, Your order has been shipped, please wait patiently.  Your order has been shipped. Please wait patiently: https://t.17track.net/zh-cn#nums=SF6047110522748,YT2533500714400158

J'AI DÉJÀ RECU (une partie de ma commande)
 MAIS IL ME MANQUAIT LA BASEPLATE !!!!!!!
UN autre opérateur ma donné ce lien d'un nouvel envoi !!! REMBOURSEZ MOI !!
regardé les photos

I've already received (part of my order) but the base plate was
missing! Another operator gave me this link for a replacement
shipment! Refund me!


Le lun. 22 déc. 2025 à 14:01, service@simsonn.com

      主题: ORDER 4229  
      描述:  
Good evening, given your response time and to answer my questions as efficiently as possible, could you please tell me how soon you can send me the footrest in black?  And if it takes longer than 10 days, can you refund me without negotiation?   
 Your item is available within 10 days at the same price as on your Amazon website. It's a Christmas gift, so please understand the urgency. Thank you

Hi karim hassaine,    We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have arranged for a replacement shipment, but it appears the original product has been lost. We will either reship the item from our German warehouse or process a refund. Which option would you prefer?  This is a replacement link, but it hasn't been updated.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047181661954

Hi karim hassaine,  We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. The issue was due to a combination of factors: we had sent a replacement plate via SF Express, but the warehouse misplaced the tracking label, and during the busy season, your email was not responded to in time. This was entirely our oversight. We have arranged for our operations team to refund the cost of the plate to you.

REMBOURSEZ MOI !

Je veux la preuve de remboursement des 69,90€

Merci



Le mar. 23 déc. 2025 à 07:07, service@simsonn.com

Hi karim hassaine,    Okay, we've processed your refund. Please check your account.  The base plate price difference is €63. After deducting €8.65 (calculated as €63 / €287.86 * €39.52 discount), your refund amount is €54.35.

Re bonjour,
Pour l'instant rien sur mon compte, je vous envoi la preuve dès réception
Merci

Le mar. 23 déc. 2025 à 11:24, service@simsonn.com

Merci bcp

J’enlève mes avis sur internet

Cordialement
